    • Method Detail

      • classifyCase

        public static StringUtil.CaseClassification classifyCase(java.lang.String input,
                                                         StringUtil.CaseClassification configuredCase)
        Given a string and intended case preservation behavior, set instructions for how to restore the case of a value after it has been transformed or replaced. This method classifies the value as one of mixed, all-upper or all-lower case, and is not concerned with the case at individual string positions. The classification value returned is intended for use with getConfiguredCase(String, CaseClassification).
        Parameters:
        input - The string to classify
        configuredCase - The case preservation behavior desired
        Returns:
        The classification

      • getConfiguredCase

        public static java.lang.String getConfiguredCase(java.lang.String input,
                                                 StringUtil.CaseClassification inputCase)
        Restores the original case after masking. The classification should be the result of calling classifyCase(String, CaseClassification) on the original input value.
        Parameters:
        input - The value after masking
        inputCase - The classification of the original input
        Returns:
        The masked value with case restored to match the original input

        public static java.lang.String removeTrailingDot(java.lang.String input)
